title: From the files of the R.C.M.P.: file 1365 - the Connors case
brief_description: This dramatization of the real-life murder of a salesman from Regina, Saskatchewan, shows the methods used by the Royal Canadian Mounted Police to catch the criminal. Voice and narration: John Drainie
